detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(3) > dd');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'div.comic-view.clearfix > div.view-sub.autoHeight > div > dl:nth-child(5) > dd');}

chapter.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div.comic-chapters > div > ul  > li');}
chapter.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}
chapter.url: function Main(text){var url = jsoup(text,'a@attr->href');url = url.replace('.html','-{p}.html')+'@zero->1@start->1';if((url+'').indexOf('.apk')>0){return null}return url;}

comic.url: function Main(text){var img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > img@attr->src');if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'img[data-cfsrc]@attr->data-cfsrc')}if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'mip-link > mip-img:not([style=display: none;])@attr->src');}if((img+'').length < 1){var img2 = jsoups(text,'div.UnderPag > mip-img');if(img2.length>1){return img2;}};if((img+'').length < 1){img = jsoup(text,'div:not([style]) > mip-link > mip-img:not([style],[width])@attr->src');}if(img.indexOf('cover')==-1){return img;}return null};

comic2.list: function Main(html){var str = strmiddle(html,'<script>;','var chapterPath');eval(str+';');return chapterImages;};
